ProjectTitle: Structural and functional characterisation of the Myzus persicae nicotinic acetylcholine receptors for the development of safer agricultural pesticides
InitialFeedbackHistory: 03/04/2024 [REDACTED] please also add the samples/materials that you will use, these are physical data in the context of a DMP, how will you document, store, preserve and/or share those? [REDACTED] you mention RDR to preserve but not to share data; note that RDR is not intended to preserve data without sharing, see www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr. PDB, EMPIAR and [REDACTED] which you describe for sharing will preserve your data as well so you can add this under preservation instead of RDR. [REDACTED] [REDACTED] publishing data in PDB, EMPIAR or [REDACTED] please register the metadata in LIRIAS so it will appear on your publication list https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/output/lirias/register-datasets-in-lirias
label: good with suggestions
